instagram.name: Instagram
instagram.description: Instagram post template with carousel, reel, and story support

headline.label: Caption Headline
headline.guidance: Hook-driven opening line; aim for 1-2 sentences

callToAction.label: Call-to-Action
examples: Explore the link in our bio

hashtags.label: Hashtags
hashtags.guidance: Mix branded + discovery hashtags; avoid banned terms

recommendations.image: High contrast, faces optional, logo clear; 1080x1080px optimal
recommendations.video: Max 90 seconds for feed, unlimited for reels; 60fps recommended
recommendations.carousel: 3-10 cards, each 1:1; design for mobile swipe

restrictions: No medical claims without FDA disclaimer
No guaranteed results; use 'may help', 'can support'
compliance.linkHandling: Link in bio; UTM parameters supported

twitter.name: X (Twitter)
twitter.description: X (Twitter) post template with thread and media support

headline.label: Main Tweet
headline.guidance: Conversational, punchy; lead with insight or question

body.label: Thread (optional)
body.guidance: Break into 2-5 sequential tweets; each ≤280 chars

callToAction.label: CTA
callToAction.guidance: Community-driven; ask questions to boost engagement

mentions.label: Mentions/Tags
mentions.guidance: Relevant accounts only; avoid spam/tag stuffing

recommendations.image: 16:9 aspect; emoji or text overlay enhances engagement

restrictions: No violent, hateful, or explicit content
compliance.linkHandling: Short URLs (bit.ly, etc.); UTM parameters in query string

linkedin.name: LinkedIn
linkedin.description: LinkedIn post template for B2B, thought leadership, and company updates

headline.label: Headline
headline.guidance: Professional, insight-driven; position as expert or conversation starter

body.label: Post Body
body.guidance: Narrative structure: Hook (why care?) → Insight → Call-to-action

mentions.label: Mentions
mentions.guidance: Tag relevant thought leaders, companies, or topics

recommendations.image: Professional, data-driven visuals; infographics excel here
recommendations.video: Max 10 min; captions essential for muted auto-play
recommendations.document: Whitepapers, case studies; generates high engagement
recommendations.carousel: 3-5 slides; each tells part of larger narrative

restrictions: Avoid political/religious content unless directly on-brand
compliance.linkHandling: Direct URLs; UTM parameters optional but tracked

email.name: Email
email.description: Email template for newsletters, announcements, and marketing campaigns

subject.label: Subject Line
subject.guidance: Personalization + urgency; A/B test variants (2 recommended)

headline.label: Email Headline (H1)
headline.guidance: Reiterate subject promise; single, clear message

body.label: Email Body
body.guidance: Scannable: short paragraphs, bold emphasis, subheadings

recommendations.content_image: Break up text; 1 image per 200 words
recommendations.video_link: Linked thumbnail; email clients don't embed video

restrictions: No deceptive subject lines or sender names
compliance.linkHandling: UTM parameters on all links; click tracking enabled

segments.guidance: Split by: new vs engaged, product interest, purchase history
examples: VIP (high engagement): premium content, exclusive offers
